title: Terrible Treant
desc:
*If a human is cut down with no tree around to hear it, does it make a sound?*

This monster gains a tremendous advantage at the start of the battle, due to the deadly combination of Strength and Luxky giving it extra damage.

This makes damage reduction items especially useful, as you can't just rely on RNG to make the Treant roll low in those first few turns. Stunning it is also an effective means to waste its intial buffs.

It also has an additional weakness to the Burning status effect. Any attempt to Burn it will additionally Stun it for a couple of turns.
